name: Skating home
description:
Can you ice skate? ... if not you may relate to the Player character in this small maze like puzzle game.

Lil Tommy can stand and move in a direction. he is unable to stop on his own. he needs help navigating his way home. will you help him?

though a small game i plan on expanding this idea because i like the movement mechanic and feel like i can create some interesting puzzles

the camera will be zoomed out more in any future iterations let me know what you think of the games idea.
